articles.author: Mary Ilyushina
articles.title: E.U. and Russia battle over Moldova’s future as elections loom - The Washington Post
articles.description: Moldova’s parliamentary elections Sunday are attracting deep interest as the small nation’s fate is seen as key to Europe’s future.
articles.content: CHISINAU, Moldova In the final days before a high-stakes parliamentary election, Moldova is caught in a war of words. While drones and missiles rain down on Ukraine next door, here Russia fights a di… [+108 chars]
